title: Business and Economics
sentences: The Central Bank announced the devaluation of the national currency.
High competitiveness of our goods allows us to expand exports.
The government took measures to curb inflation.
Для реализации проекта нам необходимо привлечь иностранные
To implement the project, we need to attract foreign investments.
The company announced the payment of dividends to its shareholders.
Резкое падение спроса привело к снижению
A sharp drop in demand led to a decrease in the profitability of production.
The board of directors approved the new business plan for the next quarter.
The main indicator of success is the net profit of the enterprise.
Мы столкнулись с проблемой временной нехватки
We faced a problem of temporary lack of liquidity.
In crisis conditions, volatility of the stock market is observed.
The company's total debt to creditors has grown.
The introduction of new technologies increases labor productivity.
Issues of small business taxation were discussed at the meeting.
Фирма подала заявление о признании её
The firm filed an application to be recognized as bankrupt.
Effective asset management minimizes financial risks.
A positive trade balance surplus is observed this year.
We need to analyze the logistics costs/expenses.
The bank offers preferential lending terms for farmers.
Annual trade turnover between the countries reached record levels.
The signing of this agreement is an important stage of our cooperation.
Insurance will help cover possible losses.
We are looking for ways to optimize tax payments.
The process of privatization of state property caused disputes.
Analysts predict stagnation in the real sector of the economy.
The conclusion of a futures contract will help fix the price.
dictionary:
девальвация - devaluation
конкурентоспособность - competitiveness
инфляция - inflation
инвестиции - investments
дивиденды - dividends
рентабельность - profitability
бизнес-план - business plan
прибыль - profit
ликвидность - liquidity
фондовый рынок - stock market
задолженность - debt/indebtedness
производительность - productivity
налогообложение - taxation
банкрот - bankrupt
управление активами - asset management
сальдо - surplus/balance
издержки - costs/expenses
кредитование - lending
товарооборот - trade turnover
этап - stage/phase
убытки - losses
налоговые выплаты - tax payments
приватизация - privatization
реальный сектор - real sector
фьючерсный контракт - futures contract
